text: The Chulyshman () is a river in Altai Republic in Russia. The river is long, and its drainage basin covers . The Chulyshman flows into Lake Teletskoye. It freezes up during late October through early December and stays icebound until late March through early May. Its main tributary is the Bashkaus. ==References== Category:Rivers of the Altai Republic
title: Chulyshman
